Synthesis method: When [Et4N]2[SFe3(CO)9],6 [Cu(MeCN)4][BF4],7 and bis(diphenylphosphino)ethane (dppe) were mixed in a 1 : 2 : 1 ratio in CH2Cl2, the dicopper–bisphosphine-bridged clusters [{(m5-S)Fe3(CO)9}Cu2(dppm)(MeCN)] (1) and [{(m3-S)Fe3(CO)9}Cu2(dppe)] (2) were obtained in good yields (Scheme 1)

When [Et4N]2[SFe3(CO)9],6 [Cu(MeCN)4][BF4],7 and bis(diphenyl- phosphino)methane (dppm) or bis(diphenylphosphino)ethane (dppe) were mixed in a 1 : 2 : 1 ratio in CH2Cl2, the dicopper– bisphosphine-bridged clusters [{(m5-S)Fe3(CO)9}Cu2(dppm)(MeCN)] (1) and [{(m3-S)Fe3(CO)9}Cu2(dppe)] (2) were obtained in good yields (Scheme 1)

Based on the afore-mentioned geometric arrangement, when complex 2 was treated with MeCN, and a polymeric complex [{(m4-S)Fe3(CO)9}Cu2(dppe)(MeCN)2]n (3) was readily crystallized after the addition of hexanes/THF (Scheme 1)
